english.segment1: I would do anything, to stay by Your side. 'Til the darkness flies away. I'm lost in the shadows. When will day begin?
english.segment3: I'm grabbing for miracles to feel You close by. To surround me with Your song. I know uncertainty, but truth lights the way
english.segment4: Like the sun, beautiful sun. Like the sun, beautiful sun
english.segment5: And I have to say I put on the line. All of my faith yes all of the time. Eye has not seen and no ear has heard. I still believe the invisible word
english.segment6: Grace is my story, hope is my song. You have been so good to me. I should have nothing, but I've got it all
english.segment7: With the Son, beautiful Son. Beautiful Son, beautiful Son. Gonna lay in the Son, beautiful Son
